Articles.Content: I've been lurking on the forums for a while and happy to finally join!!

Hello WawerOS, and welcome!

Didn't see you lurking there for a moment. Come in from the cold.

Happy landings!
Welcome aboard! I expect you'll find being in the posting population a bit more interesting ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Whatever Maximus means by "interesting" is up for you to decide. It is an experience, though.
You call sitting in front of a computer an experience? No! It's a way of life. Welcome to my world. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Another converted lurker...muahahaha

Welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

-Claw
